jp_text: （古泉）お安い御用です

en_text: Is that so? Well then.
jp_text: そうですか　では

en_text: Hmm. This inn seems pretty big, huh?
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）うーん
この旅館 結構広そうね

en_text: Apparently they've got the main building,\Nan annex, and the new wing.
jp_text:
（朝倉）本館に別館
そして新館もあるみたいですよ
google_translated:
An annex to the main building
And there is also a new building

en_text: We're going exploring!
jp_text: （ハルヒ）探検よー！

en_text: This inn's got a strange extension building!
jp_text:
この旅館
変な建て増しをしてるのよね～
google_translated:
This inn
I'm doing strange built-up ...

en_text: Seems suspicious, right?
jp_text: 何か怪しいわ

en_text: You too, Kyon.
jp_text: キョンも！

en_text: I happen to be spending a moment savoring\Nthe natural tranquility of a rural inn at night.
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）さあ 行くわよ　古泉君
（古泉）はい

en_text: Oh, are you?
jp_text: いってきます

en_text: Aganakata-san! Could you give\Nus the weather for tomorrow?...
jp_text: 明日のお天気をお願いいたします

en_text: I'm going to go for a quick bath.
jp_text:
（長門）ちょっと
お風呂行ってくるね
google_translated:
A little bit
I will go to the bath

en_text: Ah, Nagato?
jp_text: あ…　長門？

en_text: S-sorry!
jp_text:
（長門）はっ！
（キョン）ん？

en_text: Can I... open it?
jp_text: （長門）開けていい？

en_text: S-s-sure!
jp_text: （キョン）えっ！　あ… ああ

en_text: It's coming...
jp_text: （キョン）ハァ…　来る…

en_text: This pond is pretty suspicious, huh?
jp_text: （ハルヒ）この池も怪しいわね

en_text: I believe it's nothing but a normal pond...
jp_text: （古泉）ただの池だと思いますが
google_translated: I think that it is just a pond

en_text: You can see the men's bath from here!
jp_text:
ここからだと
男風呂が見えるわね！
google_translated:
From here
You can see the bath!

en_text: Suzumiya-san. You'll catch an after-bath chill.
jp_text: （古泉）涼宮さん　湯冷めしますよ

en_text: O-okay.
jp_text: やっぱり やめとく

en_text: Ahh! I'm hot! I'm sweaty! I feel disgusting!
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）あ～ 暑い
汗かいた！　気持ち悪い！

en_text: That's exactly why I told you to stop,\Nbut you wouldn't listen!
jp_text:
（朝倉）
だから やめときなさいって
言ったのに 聞かないから
google_translated:
So it's time to stop
Because I said that I said

en_text: You weren't in our room, so...
jp_text:
（古泉）お部屋に
いらっしゃらなかったものですから
google_translated:
In the room
Because it was not possible

en_text: I couldn't help it!
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）だって
しょうがないじゃない

en_text: Haru-nyan, you were here too?
jp_text: （鶴屋）おおっと

en_text: Excuse me, I'm coming in!
jp_text:
（みくる）すみません
お邪魔します

en_text: Oh, Mikiru-chan! You're late!
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）
あっ みくるちゃん
遅いじゃないの

en_text: This is my second time doing this together with you.
jp_text:
こう あなたとするのは
２回目ですね
google_translated:
This is what you want
It is the second time

en_text: You're too close again!
jp_text: 顔が近い

en_text: It's not everyday ya get to use a matchmakin' bath.
jp_text: せっかくの お見合い風呂っさね

en_text: We should try it out with Mikuru.
jp_text: ちょっと みくるで試してみるっさ

en_text: Ehh!? Why me!?
jp_text: ええっ！　なんで私なんですかあ？

en_text: We gotta offer those voluptuous breasts\Nup to the god of the matchmaking shrine!
jp_text:
その豊満な胸は 是非
お見合い神社の神様にも―
google_translated:
The rich chest is by all means
Meeting also in God of Shrine-

en_text: That's right, Mikuru-chan.\NYour breasts will make your match!
jp_text:
そうよ　みくるちゃん
“胸お見合い”よ！

en_text: I don't want to!
jp_text:
ご奉納しなくては
いけないにょろよ
google_translated:
I have to dedicate
Don't do it

en_text: Is this the string?
jp_text: （鶴屋）ひもは これっかな～？

en_text: Noo!
jp_text: （朝倉）あ こら！

en_text: Nagato-san, stop floating around over there and help me!
jp_text:
長門さんも ぷかぷか浮いてないで
２人を止めてください
google_translated:
Nagato-san is not floating
Please stop two people

en_text: It certainly sound like they're having fun.
jp_text:
（古泉）にぎやかで
楽しそうですね

en_text: I swear... It just never ends...
jp_text: （キョン）全く やれやれだ

en_text: Next time: "Give Me Your Hand..."
jp_text: （長門）次回…
